import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import '../../App.css'; import './form.css' import './add.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faCoffee } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free-solid' export default function AddExam() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [subject, setSubject] = useState(''); const [file, setFile] = useState(null); const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log('Email:', email); console.log('Subject:', subject); console.log('File:', file); }; window.scrollTo(0, 0) return
{/*

setEmail(event.target.value)} className="input-field" required />
setSubject(event.target.value)} required />
setFile(event.target.files[0])} />
*/}

setSubject(event.target.value)} required classname="input-field" />

Gracias por tu contribucion Findtest
